Got Landing Page Questions? We've Got Answers!
Why Choose LeadPages for My Business?

LeadPages isn't just a landing page builder, it's your conversion powerhouse.  Create high-converting landing pages, pop-up forms, and even complete websites—all designed to capture leads, boost sales, and grow your business.
How Easy is LeadPages to Use?
LeadPages is designed for everyone, even if you're not a tech whiz.  Our drag-and-drop interface makes building beautiful, effective landing pages simple.  Get started in minutes, not hours.
What Kind of Landing Pages Can I Create?
LeadPages empowers you to create a wide range of landing pages for any purpose: lead generation, product launches, webinars, sales funnels, and more.  The possibilities are endless.
What Support Does LeadPages Offer?
We're here to help you every step of the way.  Enjoy access to our extensive knowledge base, helpful tutorials, and a responsive support team ready to answer your questions.
